channel.title: Amazing Grace Baptist Church Mount Airy
channel.description: Audio broadcasts of the services at the Amazing Grace Baptist Church in Mount Airy, North Carolina where Dr. Jonathan Barker is the Pastor. Visit our website at www.agbcmountairy.com and follow us on Facebook: www.facebook.com/agbcmountairy for more information about AGBC!
